casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Deshawn TYSON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 17, 2019

Laila M. G. Haswell, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Rita M. Shair, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn. App. 879, 203 A.3d 1289, 2019 WL 641813 (AC 40468) (2019), is denied.
